item.title: Linux Upskill Challenge: Setting up on Google Cloud Platform
item.description: This September1, I’m going to participate in the Linux Upskill Challenge. I read about it a little on Hacker News yesterday, and it looks like it aligns really well with my goals of working as an SRE. The challenge starts tomorrow, so today is “Day 0” of 20: getting set up. It’s possible that I may create new posts related to this challenge - even though the content is listed publicly on Github at all times - but we’ll see at the end of this month.
